Question: All three men—Tolstoy, Gandhi, and this person—had been influenced by Jesus' teachings on non-resistance to evil force.
Hints: This person organized and led marches for blacks' right to vote, desegregation, labor rights and other basic civil rights.
This person was second in Gallup's List of Most Widely Admired People of the 20th Century.
